definition: to correct (in writing) sb's errors or misconceptions
variegated/heterogeneous/to refute/to contradict/to ship by barge/a barge/a lighter (ship)

sentences.english: What follows is an abstract of the Summa contra Gentiles.
sentences.chinese: 以下是《異教徒駁議輯要》的一個摘要。

sentences.english: I think the proposition is invalid , and today I will try to refute it.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得這個提法有問題，今日試駁議之。

sentences.english: At the meeting, we refuted his proposition.
sentences.chinese: 會議上，我們對他的主張提出了駁議。
